item.title: 地产巨头海因斯聘用施罗德高管负责欧洲富豪业务
item.description: 美国房地产巨头 Hines 聘请了 Schroders Plc 的前高管 Eugenio Cicconetti，在全球资金管理公司纷纷专注于私人财富领域的大背景下，为欧洲的富豪建立自己的部门。【原文：US real estate giant Hines hired former Schroders Plc executive Eugenio Cicconetti to build out its unit for Europe’s rich amid a global boom in money managers focusing on the private wealth sector.】

item.title: 中国加快电网投资以吸收大量太阳能发电
item.description: 中国加大了对电力网络的投入，使其能够从世界领先的太阳能发电厂吸收更多电力。【原文：China has boosted spending on its power networks to allow them to absorb more electricity from its world-leading buildout of solar plants.】

item.title: 前软银创雨者纳赫塔被选为 Bakkt 扭亏为盈的负责人
item.description: 阿克谢-纳赫塔（Akshay Naheta）是软银集团的前官员，曾负责监督该集团的一些最大交易，他已加入 Bakkt 控股公司，担任联席首席执行官，帮助这家陷入困境的美国加密货币交易和托管平台扭亏为盈。【原文：Akshay Naheta, a former SoftBank Group official who has overseen some of its biggest deals, has joined Bakkt Holdings Inc. as a co-chief executive officer to help turn around the struggling American crypto trading and custody platform.】

item.title: 贝莱德基金被没收的中国大厦将以亏损 40% 的价格出售
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：A China office complex previously owned by a BlackRock Inc. fund is close to being sold at a discount of more than 40% in a deal that would lead to losses for the US asset manager and banks backing it, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 在 "尘埃落定 "之前，南非将改变汇率走势：日间指南
item.description: 南非储备银行在评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策将对通胀产生的影响时，将淡化上月物价涨幅低于预期的情况，并维持借贷成本不变。【原文：The South African Reserve Bank is set to look past a smaller-than-expected rise in prices last month and keep borrowing costs unchanged while it assesses the impact that US President Donald Trump’s trade policies will have on inflation.】

item.title: 散户需求升温，香港计划设定新股保证金贷款上限
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港市场监管机构正计划对首次公开发行股票时用于购买股票的保证金贷款设置上限，以抑制散户投资者的炽热需求。【原文：Hong Kong’s market regulator is planning to cap margin loans used to buy shares at initial public offerings, according to people familiar with the matter, in an effort to clamp down on heated demand from retail investors.】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老金对特朗普治下的美国能源资产保持警惕
item.description: 由于可再生能源和化石燃料项目政策的不确定性，澳大利亚一些最大的养老基金正在对美国能源资产投资采取谨慎态度。【原文：Some of Australia’s largest pension funds are taking a cautious approach to investments in US energy assets due to policy uncertainty for renewable and fossil fuel projects.】

item.title: 金融时报》称英伟达计划大规模投资美国制造的电子产品
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Nvidia Corp. aims to spend several hundred billion dollars to procure US-made chips and electronics over the next four years, the Financial Times reported.】

item.title: 中国人民银行加强现金支持，中国债券从跌势中回升
item.description: 在中国央行加强短期资金支持后，中国政府债券延续了复苏势头。【原文：Chinese government bonds extended a recovery after the country’s central bank boosted short-term funding support.】

item.title: Couche-Tard、Seven & i 在 3 月底前征求美国商店的意向
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Seven & i Holdings Co.和 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.旗下美国便利店剥离方案的潜在买家必须在本月底之前表达他们的兴趣，并表明他们能够克服反垄断方面的担忧，因为有关可能的联合的谈判仍在继续。【原文：Potential buyers for a divestiture package of Seven & i Holdings Co. and Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.’s US convenience stores have until the end of the month to express their interest and show they can overcome antitrust concerns as talks over a possible union continue, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 菲律宾中央银行行长称菲律宾将抵制比索大幅波动
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，菲律宾央行将抵制比索的大幅波动，尤其是在比索走软的情况下，因为本周从印尼到土耳其的新兴市场都变得动荡不安。【原文：The Philippine central bank will resist big swings in the peso, particularly if it is weakening, Governor Eli Remolona said, as emerging markets from Indonesia to Turkey turned volatile this week.】

item.title: 韩国结婚人数激增，为老龄化国家带来希望
item.description: 韩国的结婚率是有记录以来最高的，这对于一个在经济悲观情绪日益严重的情况下一直在加大力度提高世界最低生育率的国家来说是一个充满希望的迹象。【原文：South Korean marriages increased the most on record in a hopeful sign for a nation that has been ramping up efforts to boost the world’s lowest fertility rate behind growing economic pessimism.】

item.title: 为什么在家工作会受到威胁？
item.description:
在本周的澳大利亚播客中：主持人丽贝卡-琼斯（Rebecca Jones）与彭博社的彼得-维尔科（Peter Vercoe）谈论最近对在家工作的取缔 

。【原文：

On this week’s Australia Podcast: Host Rebecca Jones speaks to Bloomberg’s Peter Vercoe about the recent clampdowns on working from home 

】

item.title: 印度钢铁股因进口税提案而前景光明
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 特朗普称美联储应降息，关税推动升温
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，美联储应该降息，在官员们权衡他推动关税政策的经济成本之际，他与美国央行产生了分歧。【原文：President Donald Trump said the Federal Reserve should cut interest rates, splitting with the US central bank as officials weigh the economic cost of his tariff push.】

item.title: 中国股市对香港股市的溢价有望创 2020 年新低
item.description: 随着对人工智能的乐观情绪推动投资者转向香港市场，中国大陆股票与在香港上市的同类股票之间的价格差距有望达到四年多来的最低点。【原文：The price gap between mainland China stocks and their counterparts listed in Hong Kong is poised to reach a more than four-year low, as optimism in artificial intelligence drives investors to the city’s market.】

item.title: 中国银行连续第五个月维持基准贷款利率不变
item.description: 在没有更多货币宽松政策的情况下，中国的银行连续第五个月维持基准贷款利率不变，因为官员们为在美国可能再次加征关税的情况下采取刺激措施留出了余地。【原文：Chinese banks held their benchmark lending rates for a fifth straight month in the absence of more monetary easing, as officials leave open room for stimulus in the likely case that US tariffs rise again.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁推动铜价反弹至 10,000 美元
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推动对重要工业金属征收关税引发全球贸易混乱数周之后，铜价突破了每吨 10,000 美元的关键门槛。【原文：Copper marched past its key threshold of $10,000 a ton after weeks of global trade dislocation triggered by President Donald Trump’s push for tariffs on the crucial industrial metal.】

item.title: 澳大利亚就业率意外下降，货币汇率下跌
item.description: 澳大利亚 2 月份的就业率出人意料地下降，导致货币和政府债券收益率走低，验证了储备银行的降息决定。【原文：Australian employment surprisingly dropped in February, sending the currency and government bond yields lower and validating the Reserve Bank’s decision to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 台积电面临被腾讯超越成为亚洲最大公司的风险
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. risks giving up its lead over Tencent Holdings Ltd. as Asia’s biggest company by market value, with investors focused on the latter’s artificial intelligence plans.】

item.title: 台湾在权衡特朗普和人工智能的不确定性后将维持关键利率不变
item.description: 台湾可能会将其关键政策利率维持在 2008 年以来的最高水平，因为政策制定者要考虑特朗普政府可能征收的芯片关税、人工智能狂潮的前景以及通货膨胀。【原文：Taiwan will likely keep its key policy rate at the highest level since 2008 as policymakers consider potential chip tariffs from the Trump administration, the outlook for the AI frenzy and inflation.】

item.title: 中国 1500 亿美元的房地产债务重组陷入困境
item.description: 被违约的中国开发商拖欠约 1,500 亿美元债务的债权人始终只能拿回几分钱，但许多人发现，即使债务计划达成一致，也不一定能一锤定音。【原文：Creditors owed around $150 billion by defaulted Chinese developers always stood to get just pennies back, but many are finding that even after a debt plan is agreed it’s not necessarily a done deal.】

item.title: 鲍威尔淡化日益增长的风险，认为关税影响只是暂时的
item.description: 数周以来，美国经济形势一直暗流涌动。如果说周三是美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔敲响警钟的机会，那么他却硬生生地放弃了。【原文：For weeks the US economic picture has been darkening. If Wednesday was an opportunity for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell to raise the alarm, he took a hard pass.】

item.title: 英格兰银行准备采取鹰派倾向：决策指南
item.description: 随着官员们开始担心唐纳德-特朗普关税战的影响以及国内通胀的重新抬头，英国央行周四的态度可能会变得不那么鸽派。【原文：The Bank of England is likely to turn less dovish on Thursday as officials start to fret about the fallout from Donald Trump’s tariff wars and a renewed bout of domestic inflation.】

item.title: 哈利法克斯（Halifax）称，英国首次购房者在借贷便宜的情况下激增
item.description: 最新分析显示，由于借贷成本的降低使人们更能负担得起房屋贷款，去年英国首次购房者在房屋贷款中所占的比例创下了历史新高。【原文：UK first-time buyers made up a record share of home loans last year as easing borrowing costs made houses more affordable, according to new analysis.】

item.title: 掉期交易商押注亚洲将进一步降息
item.description: 亚洲掉期市场显示，随着美元下滑，对该地区降息的押注略有增加。【原文：Swap markets in Asia are indicating a slight increase in bets on interest-rate cuts in the region as the dollar slumps.】

item.title: 美国经济增长前景与库存水平成为关注焦点，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 美联储维持利率不变后，美国经济增长前景成为关注焦点，同时数据显示燃料消费强劲，石油价格企稳。【原文：Oil steadied, with the outlook for US growth in focus after the Federal Reserve left rates unchanged, while data showed robust fuel consumption.】

item.title: 软银以 65 亿美元收购芯片设计公司 Ampere
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp）已同意收购半导体设计公司 Ampere Computing LLC，此举进一步扩大了这家日本投资公司在人工智能基础设施领域的推进力度。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. has agreed to acquire semiconductor designer Ampere Computing LLC in a move that further broadens the Japanese investment firm’s push into artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行行长预计 4 月降息，关税影响不大
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，菲律宾央行可能将在下个月恢复宽松货币政策，美国关税可能只会对这个东南亚国家的经济产生 "适度 "影响。【原文：The Philippine central bank will likely resume monetary policy easing next month, Governor Eli Remolona said, with US tariffs likely to have only a “modest” impact on the Southeast Asian nation’s economy.】
